content.prompt:
Refer to the slide that you see. The slide will be shown for four minutes only.

  


Which of the following best describes the two paintings?

choices.label: A combination of genre and portrait painting
A combination of figurative and allegorical painting
A combination of narrative and history painting
A combination of symbolic and mythological painting

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
